articles.content: NEW YORK (Reuters) -The U.S. government and two of the nations largest pharmacy chains on Monday began inoculating nursing home residents against COVID-19, among the first Americans besides healthcar… [+4810 chars]

articles.title: Concern among Muslims over halal status of COVID-19 vaccine - PBS NewsHour
articles.description: In October, Indonesian diplomats and Muslim clerics stepped off a plane in China. While the diplomats were there to finalize deals to ensure millions of doses reached Indonesian citizens, the clerics had a much different concern: Whether the COVID-19 vaccine …
